text: There are places that do not use the word "hen (they)," as is the case here, as well as in the Gemara regarding "There are 13 main categories of damages" and in the case of "There are 4... (please some amend translation of this case)."  And there are places that do use the word "hen" as in the case of "There are for guardians" and "There are 4 new years."
title: Tosafot on Bava Kamma
